Oak Ridge, Tenn. : Distributed by the Office of Scientific and Technical Information, U.S. Dept. of Energy. 16 pages : digital, PDF file. text txt rdacontent computer c rdamedia online resource cr rdacarrier Published through SciTech Connect. 03/01/1972. "fermilab-proposal-0168" March, R.H.; Pondrom, L.G.; Devlin, T.J.; Overseth, O.E. Free-to-read Unrestricted online access star The Coulomb production of Σ° hyperons on uranium and nickel nuclei has been measured in a beam of Λ hyperons at the CERN Proton Synchrotron. The results for the Σ° lifetime, τΣ° = (0.58 ± 0.13) x 10⁻¹⁹ sec, and for the Σ°-Λ magnetic transition moment,  = (1.82{sub -0.18}{sup +0.25}) nuclear magnetons, are in agreement with SU(3) predictions.
